items.preText: Deep: "Outstanding control % from Shoaib Malik. He's bedding in for the long haul, but also managing to counter all that Bangladesh bowlers are throwing at him."
items.text: length ball on middle stump, clipped to the right of deep square leg
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Imam-ul-Haq, 2 runs

items.text: bouncer rising high over leg stump, well over head height, Imam ducks under it
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Imam-ul-Haq, 1 wide

items.text: length ball angling across to off stump, defended to extra-cover
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Imam-ul-Haq, no run

items.text: length ball close to off stump, Imam plays a checked drive to mid-off
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Imam-ul-Haq, no run

items.text: back of a length, too straight, tickled off the pads and he manages to place it extremely fine
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Imam-ul-Haq, FOUR runs

items.preText: Just like that, without too much effort, these two have gone at a run a ball over the last five overs.
items.text: back of a length, spins in quite sharply towards off stump as Malik makes himself a bit of room. Punched to cover point
items.shortText: Mahmudullah to Shoaib Malik, no run

items.text: back of a length again, this time he stays put and goes down the ground, picks up a punched single to long-on
items.shortText: Mahmudullah to Shoaib Malik, 1 run

items.text: tossed up full on off stump, driven to long-on
items.shortText: Mahmudullah to Imam-ul-Haq, 1 run

items.text: full on middle stump, driven to midwicket
items.shortText: Mahmudullah to Shoaib Malik, no run

items.text: full on middle stump once more, gets his front leg out of the way and drives to long-on
items.shortText: Mahmudullah to Shoaib Malik, 1 run

items.text: shortish, and only the tiniest bit of width, but Imam puts it away nicely, goes deep in his crease to cut to the right of backward point. Slows down as it nears the boundary, though
items.shortText: Mahmudullah to Imam-ul-Haq, 3 runs

items.preText: A wide-ish gully has moved into place...
items.text: ... pretty much exactly for that shot. Back of a length outside off, opens his bat face, attempting to pick up another steered single to third man
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Imam-ul-Haq, no run

items.text: full on off stump, driven towards mid-off
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Imam-ul-Haq, no run

items.text: bouncer over leg stump, Imam crouches low to evade it. Leaves the bat pointing up like a periscope, but the ball's well clear of it
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Imam-ul-Haq, no run

items.text: another short ball, this one gets up to a better height, just over his chest and over off stump, and Imam has to drag his pull a little. Hits it in the air but it lands well short of the man on the square leg boundary
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Imam-ul-Haq, 1 run

items.text: length ball close to off stump, defended to mid-off
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Shoaib Malik, no run

items.text: back of a length outside off. Shuffles all the way across and tucks it to long leg
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Shoaib Malik, 1 run

items.preText:
Here's the second part-timer. Soumya Sarkar with his Gangulyesque seam-up.

Mustafa Moudi: "India and Pakistan had exact opposite campaigns this year. Pak won comfortably against HK while Ind struggled hard to defeat them. Then when both sides faced each other, Ind won comfortably both the games. Then Pak struggled against Afg but managed to chase the target which India couldn't. And now Pakistan are struggling against a side whom Ind defeated easily!!"
items.text: back of a length outside off stump, punched crisply to deep point
items.shortText: Soumya Sarkar to Shoaib Malik, 1 run

items.text: short, down the leg side, pulled to the left of fine leg
items.shortText: Soumya Sarkar to Imam-ul-Haq, 2 runs

items.text: back of a length on leg stump, tucked away to fine leg
items.shortText: Soumya Sarkar to Imam-ul-Haq, 1 run

items.text: shortish outside off, opens his bat face and steers to third man
items.shortText: Soumya Sarkar to Shoaib Malik, 1 run

items.text: length ball on off stump, lets it come on and guides it to third man
items.shortText: Soumya Sarkar to Imam-ul-Haq, 1 run

items.preText: Ashutosh Vikram: "Wish India had someone like Shoaib Malik, bats like a proper middle-order batsman and gives handy overs.."
items.text: full outside off, driven to long-off
items.shortText: Soumya Sarkar to Shoaib Malik, 1 run

items.text: Mashrafe takes a screamer! Full on middle, and he attempts to chip this over midwicket, but the fielder dives like Superman and takes an amazing catch to remove the batsman. Malik looks absolutely gobsmacked.
items.postText: Mashrafe's walking out of the field due to an injury to his little finger. Probably after that catch.
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Shoaib Malik, OUT

dismissal.text: Shoaib Malik c Mashrafe Mortaza b Rubel Hossain 30 (51b 2x4 0x6) SR: 58.82

items.text: good length just outside off, and fended off the back foot
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Shadab Khan, no run
